metadata.title: CVE-2024-23650 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: BuildKit is a toolkit for converting source code to build artifacts in anefficient, expressive and repeatable manner. A malicious BuildKit client orfrontend could craft a request that could lead to BuildKit daemon crashingwith a panic. The issue has been fixed in v0.12.5. As a workaround, avoidusing BuildKit frontends from untrusted sources.

criterions.comment: docker.io: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
